sentences.en: The tobacco workers were paid on a piecework basis.
sentences.cn: 烟草工人拿的是计件报酬。

trans.tran_cn: 计件工作，按件计酬的工作
trans.tran_en: work for which you are paid according to the number of things you produce rather than the number of hours that you spend working
